mapper.insert: insert into oomall_goods_category(name, pid , pic_url, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) VALUES(#{name},#{pid},#{picUrl},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified},#{beDeleted})
mapper.select: select * from oomall_goods_category where id=#{id} and is_deleted!=true;
mapper.update: update oomall_goods_category set is_deleted=true where id=#{id} and is_deleted!=true;
